title: Reasonable Adjustments
reasonableAdjustments: Do you have a physical, mental or learning disability or health condition that means you need support during the case? (optional)
insetText: We know some people need support to access information and use our services. We call this a reasonable adjustment. Some reasonable adjustments need to be agreed by a judge or HMCTS. You can discuss with the tribunal if your needs change.
bullet1: documents in alternative formats, colours and fonts
bullet2: help with communicating, sight, hearing, speaking and interpretation
bullet3: access and mobility support if a hearing takes place in person
radioNo: No - I do not need any support at this time
yesDetail: Tell us what support you need
